actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, Treasury Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify the existence of tax incentives for investment in resource recovery systems.
short_title: Resource Recovery Tax Incentive and Clarification Act of 1983

summary.text: Resource Recovery Tax Incentive and Clarification Act of 1983 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an energy investment tax credit for resource recovery and solid waste disposal property used by tax-exempt organizations and governmental units.

titles.title: Resource Recovery Tax Incentive and Clarification Act of 1983
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify the existence of tax incentives for investment in resource recovery systems.
